categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text: The Deysum system was a star system located within the Mid Rim region of the galaxy.

During the Nagai–Tof War, the system was passed by the second movements of the Nagai and Tof invasion forces on their way to Zeltros. The system was later invaded and occupied by the Yuuzhan Vong shortly after they arrived in nearby Hutt Space.
